com.experian.aperture.datastudio.sdk.step

Interface Datastore


  • public interface Datastore
    The datastore interface allows the SDK to obtain details about a Data Studio datastore, including its type (database or file) and get access to its tables for reading or writing (file only).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      File createNewTable(String filename)
      Creates a new file in the datastore and returns a pointer to it allowing it to be written to.
      String getDatastoreType()
      Get the datastore type.
      String getDescription()
      The description of the datastore
      String getDisplayName()
      Get the display name for the Datastore.
      String getExternalName()
      Get the external name for the datastore.
      long getId()
      Gets the Id of a datastore.
      Map<String,String> getProperties()
      Return a key/value list of the properties that define the datastore.
      List<TableSDK> getTables(long userId)
      Get tables located in the datastore that are visible to the given user
      boolean isImport()
      Is the datastore a private upload area
      void refresh()
      Refresh the datastore asynchronously
      void refreshSynchronous()
      Refresh the datastore and return when complete

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        long getId()
        Gets the Id of a datastore. Is unique and never changes.
        Returns:
        long id

      • getDisplayName

        String getDisplayName()
        Get the display name for the Datastore. This can be changed by users at any time.
        Returns:
        datastore's display name

      • getExternalName

        String getExternalName()
        Get the external name for the datastore. This name is fixed and cannot be changed.
        Returns:
        datastore's external name

      • getDescription

        String getDescription()
        The description of the datastore
        Returns:
        description of datastore

      • getDatastoreType

        String getDatastoreType()
        Get the datastore type. For example JDBC, LOCAL_FILES, HDFS.
        Returns:
        datastore type as string

      • isImport

        boolean isImport()
        Is the datastore a private upload area
        Returns:
        Returns true if the datastore is the current user's private file import area.

      • getProperties

        Map<String,String> getProperties()
        Return a key/value list of the properties that define the datastore. The data is different for each datastore type.
        Returns:
        map of key/value properties

      • refresh

        void refresh()
        Refresh the datastore asynchronously

      • refreshSynchronous

        void refreshSynchronous()
        Refresh the datastore and return when complete

      • getTables

        List<TableSDK> getTables(long userId)
        Get tables located in the datastore that are visible to the given user
        Parameters:
        userId - - obtained in the SDK using the getUserId() function
        Returns:
        list of tables

      • createNewTable

        File createNewTable(String filename)
             throws SDKException
        Creates a new file in the datastore and returns a pointer to it allowing it to be written to. To change files, see the TableSDK interface.
        Parameters:
        filename - - the filename to create - the extension and associated must match those supported by Data Studio.
        Returns:
        File object
        Throws:
        SDKException - - will throw if the datastore is not a file datastore, or if the file exists already.
